verses.verse: The Lukewarm Church “And to the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write, (Is. 65:16; 2 Cor. 1:20) ‘These things says the Amen, (Rev. 1:5; 3:7; 19:11) the Faithful and True Witness, ((Col. 1:15)) the Beginning of the creation of God:
(Rev. 3:1) “I know your works, that you are neither cold nor hot. I could wish you were cold or hot.
So then, because you are lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will vomit you out of My mouth.
Because you say, (Hos. 12:8; Zech. 11:5; (Matt. 5:3); 1 Cor. 4:8) ‘I am rich, have become wealthy, and have need of nothing’—and do not know that you are wretched, miserable, poor, blind, and naked—

I counsel you (Is. 55:1; Matt. 13:44) to buy from Me gold refined in the fire, that you may be rich; and (2 Cor. 5:3) white garments, that you may be clothed, that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed; and anoint your eyes with eye salve, that you may see.
(Job 5:17) As many as I love, I rebuke and (Prov. 3:12; (2 Cor. 11:32); Heb. 12:6) chasten. Therefore be zealous and repent.
Behold, (Song 5:2) I stand at the door and knock. (Luke 12:36, 37; John 10:3) If anyone hears My voice and opens the door, ((John 14:23)) I will come in to him and dine with him, and he with Me.
To him who overcomes (Matt. 19:28; 2 Tim. 2:12; (Rev. 2:26; 20:4)) I will grant to sit with Me on My throne, as I also overcame and sat down with My Father on His throne.
(Rev. 2:7) “He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches.” ’ ”

The Throne Room of Heaven After these things I looked, and behold, a door standing (Ezek. 1:1; Rev. 19:11) open in heaven. And the first voice which I heard was like a (Rev. 1:10) trumpet speaking with me, saying, “Come up here, and I will show you things which must take place after this.”
Immediately (Rev. 1:10) I was in the Spirit; and behold, (1 Kin. 22:19; Is. 6:1; Ezek. 1:26; Dan. 7:9; Rev. 3:21; 4:9) a throne set in heaven, and One sat on the throne.
